name: MessageBird Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 MessageBird Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends SMS via MessageBird

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends SMS via MessageBird | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

originator.name: originator
originator.description: The number from which to send the message
originator.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: The number from which to send the message | (必填项)

recipients.name: recipients
recipients.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: All recipients separated by commas | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The message to be send | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: createdDatetime (值: None) - The date and time of the creation of the message in RFC3339 format (Y-m-dTH:i:sP)
datacoding (值: None) - Using unicode will limit the maximum number of characters to 70 instead of 160
gateway (值: None) - The SMS route that is used to send the message
groupIds (值: None) - Group IDs separated by commas, If provided recipients can be omitted
mclass (值: None) - Indicated the message type. 1 is a normal message, 0 is a flash message.
reportUrl (值: None) - The status report URL to be used on a per-message basis. Reference is required for a status report webhook to be sent.
scheduledDatetime (值: None) - The scheduled date and time of the message in RFC3339 format (Y-m-dTH:i:sP)
type (值: None) - The type of message. Values can be: sms, binary, or flash.
typeDetails (值: None) - A hash with extra information. Is only used when a binary message is sent.
validity (值: None) - The amount of seconds that the message is valid
